title: Modularization approach for large-scale electrolysis systems: a review
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1208-1224
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01588B, Review Article

According to the current state of research and development, it is not possible to build a gigawatt electrolysis system with one single electrolysis stack.
